title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                 Curriculum Materials        War for Freedom: African Americans in the Era of the Civil War - a curriculum developed by the American History Workshop for use by the National Park Service. National Park Service Jeopardy  This powerpoint is designed as a game. Project in class and challenge your students' knowledge of their National Parks!  Harpers Ferry Jeopardy There are two rounds of Harpers Ferry Jeopardy. The first round covers basic information and the second round is very specific to industry and archeology.
